7th Ward: A Race Study

A map of Philadelphia's 7th Ward as it was in 1896 when W.E.B DuBois was commissioned by U. Penn to do research on the black population in Philadelphia. A brief summary of the state of black America and his analysis can be provided and maybe even a contrast of black Philadelphias today. I can help w/ that btw :)

An artist would love to

Conceive what this would look like - but perhaps we could have mini monuments throughout the city. affirming that we share a creative experience as well as the diversity that makes us Philadelphia - rather than elevating individuals, wars, etc. We need to reaffirm a 'social purpose'.
